trends: There have been no other sightings in Anson
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Three UFOs hiding in the light !!!!
divs: Sighting Detailsmy grandaughter and I were at the park and all of a sudden i looked up because the clouds caught my attention .As they crossed past the sun I decided to take some pictures of the clouds but what came out on my pictures were three ufo's one egg shape one sphere with the ball shape in the middle and another that looked like it was side ways with the ball shape facing right .i have the pictures but still can not believe what i have captured .i am still in shock but feel blessed to have these pictures.
